gml:Dictionary.gml:description: The type of an identification for a location type in a gazetteer.
gml:Dictionary.gml:name: DoD/IC Dictionary: GSIP Geographic Identifier Identification Type Code Dictionary

gml:Definition.gml:description: An assigned unique alphanumeric string (or 'code') by which a particular geographic entity is, or was, known.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Code

gml:Definition.gml:description: A unique proper name, specific term, or expression by which a particular geographic entity is, or was, known.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Name
